questions.question: What is the predominant color of the upholstery fabric covering the entire seating area?
Considering the overall form, what geometric shape best describes the modular seating unit's arrangement?
What is the apparent texture of the fabric used to upholster the seating components of the sectional?
What material appears to constitute the slender legs supporting the seating module of this item?
Observing the legs closely, what seems to be their finish; polished, matte, or brushed?
What is the general visual appearance of the upholstery fabric; smooth, rough, or patterned?
Focusing on the seams, what is the apparent style; visible or hidden stitching?
Describe the height of the seat cushion relative to the overall seating height, is it low or high?
What is the apparent consistency in the color tone across the entire upholstery fabric?
Describe the visual nature of the metal leg supports; are they thick or thin?
Regarding the seat cushions, is the form generally defined by sharp or softly rounded edges?
What is the overall design aesthetic of the piece; modern, traditional, or something else?
Considering the armrests, are they incorporated as part of the main seating unit or separate?
Describe the visual impression created by the fabric's texture, is it coarse or fine?
What is the apparent style of the legs, are they straight or tapered?
